author: potuz
content: I have a proposal that may get zero traction: why not call just all ACD and simply have differently oriented agendas? devs from both camps are wellcome and often needed in all calls. Unless it's something pretty technical on the EVM or about forkchoice, we often times need imput from both sides. I find this need of separation silly

author: timbeiko
content: I think there's value in having some separation of "default agenda" (and facilitator ðŸ˜› !), but I've been calling them both "ACD" for short

author: timbeiko
content:
Reflecting on the planning process for Shanghai/Capella, and the discussions around fork planning for withdrawals/EOF/4844/1153/BLS/etc., I'd like to propose we use Ethereum Magicians a bit more proactively to have those types of discussions. I've put up a proposal on the forum directly fleshing out the details: https://ethereum-magicians.org/t/proposal-network-upgrade-meta-threads/12552 

Will add to the ACDE agenda next week to discuss ðŸ˜„
